title: "Artificial intelligence powered statistical genetics in biobanks"
excerpt: "There are, however, two major challenges to statistical genetics for this goal: small sample size—high dimensionality and multilayered—heterogenous endophenotypes. Rather counterintuitively, biobank data generally have small sample size relative to their data dimensionality consisting of genomic variation,"
